title: shivan malai
sahitya:
shivan malai vITriDum shemmalaip-pOTrinAl kavalaiyaTra vAzhvai bhuviyil peTriDalAm


anupallavi

  tava yOga sAdhanaiyin avashiyam Eduminri bhava vinaiyin vEdanai pani pOl maraindODa


caraNam    varumaiyin koDumaiyAl vADit-tuDikkAmal sirumaiyin verumaiyil sikkit-tighaikkAmal
marumaiyOD-immaiyil mana magizhndiDavE perumai perugum Or vAzhvu peTruyya
